subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping
lead_paragraph: When 180 riders line up for the start of the 95th Tour de France, they will embark on a 2,212-mile journey of uncertainty: for themselves, for the Tour as an event and for cycling as a sport.
snippet: When 180 riders line up for the start of the 95th Tour de France, they will embark on a 2,212-mile journey of uncertainty: for themselves, for the Tour as an event and for cycling as a sport.
